data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Vidthayanon, Chavalit (2013): Thampramon tonvuthi, a new genus and new species of cavernicolous crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Potamidae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 3652 (2): 265-276, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3652.2.4
